Legal Marketing Simplified.

Setup a campaign.

Launch an advertising campaign. Learn which sources generates the most leads.

Track print activities.

Create a unique phone number for each campaign and easily track how it is performing.

Track online activities.

Embed a form on a website, or track activity through Google Adwords.

Automatic caller ID.

Miss a potential client's call, their information will automatically appear in Clio for future follow up.

Analyze and optimize.

Scrutinize your return-on-investment (ROI) to see which campaigns are the most effective at generating interest and revenue.
